fullname: Prophet Muḥammad, peace and blessings be upon him

info: Companion of the Prophet ﷺ and famous for having married 3 prominent male companions at 3 different times: Jaʿfar ibn Abi Ṭālib, then when he died, Abu Bakr as-Siddīq, and when he died, ʿAli ibn Abi Ṭālib.

fullname: ʿAbdullāh ibn Jaʿfar ibn Abi Ṭālib
searchname: Abdullah ibn Jafar ibn Abi Talib
info: Son of Asmā bint ʿUmays and Jaʿfar ibn Abi Ṭālib
Son of Asmāʾ bint Abi Bakr and therefore nephew of ʿĀʾishah bint Abi Bakr

fullname: ʿAbdur-Raḥmān ibn al-Qāsim ibn Muḥammad ibn Abi Bakr
searchname: Abdur-Rahman ibn al-Qasim ibn Muhammad ibn Abi Bakr
info: Son of al-Qāsim ibn Muḥammad ibn Abi Bakr, making him the grandson of Asmāʾ bint ʿUmays and Abi Bakr as well as the great-nephew of ʿAʾishah bint Abi Bakr

fullname: al-Qāsim ibn Muḥammad ibn Abi Bakr
searchname: al-Qasim ibn Muhammad ibn Abi Bakr
info: Grandson of Abi Bakr and Asmāʾ bint ʿUmays

fullname: ʿUmar ibn ʿAbd al-ʿAzīz ibn Marwān
searchname: Umar ibn Abd al-Azīz ibn Marwan
info: Caliph of the Muslims in the seventh and eighth centuries, considered to be one of the Righteous Caliphs (al-Khulafāʾ al-Rāshidīn) - the only non-companion to achieve that status

fullname: Muḥammad ibn Muslim ibn ʿUbaydullāh ibn ʿAbdullāh ibn Shihāb al-Zuhri
searchname: Muhammad ibn Muslim ibn Ubaydullah ibn Abdullah ibn Shihab al-Zuhri

displayname: ʿAbdullah ibn Abi Bakr ibn Ḥazm
fullname: ʿAbdullah ibn Abi Bakr ibn Ḥazm al-Anṣāri
searchname: Abdullah ibn Abi Bakr ibn Hazm al-Ansari

info: 8th century author of the famous Sīrat Rasūlullah, a biography of the Prophet Muḥammad ﷺ

fullname: Umm ʿAwn bint Muḥammad ibn Jaʿfar ibn Abi Ṭālib
searchname: Umm Awn bint Muhammad ibn Jafar ibn Abi Talib

fullname: Umm ʿĪsā al-Jazzār or Umm Īsā al-Khuzāʿiyyah
searchname: Umm Isa al-Jazzar or Umm Isa al-Khuzaiyyah

info: Founder of one of the four legal schools of thought in Sunni Islam
